name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in delivering high-performance applications. Proficient in **AWS**, **TypeScript**, **React**, **CI/CD**, **Microservices**, and **RESTful API** development, utilizing **Agile** methodologies to ensure efficient project execution.  
Skilled in building responsive applications using **React Native** and implementing infrastructures as code (IaC) strategies. Experienced with testing frameworks such as **Jest**, **Cypress**, and **Backstop** to ensure high-quality deliverables.  
Possesses a strong background in designing and developing applications across healthcare and financial industries, with hands-on expertise in both frontend and backend development using **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, **Django**, and **Vue**. Experienced in constructing AI/ML-powered platforms that leverage predictive analytics and automation.  
Proficient in deploying cloud-native systems and implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines, while aligning with compliance standards including HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Solid experience in MLOps, focused on model training, serving, and orchestration through **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.

• Created and managed **CI/CD** pipelines utilizing **GitHub Actions** and **Azure DevOps**, achieving a **30%** reduction in deployment times through automation and rigorous testing.
• Integrated **RESTful APIs** with secure back-end services, ensuring high performance and reliability while meeting compliance standards (HIPAA, FHIR, GDPR).
• Implemented robust testing frameworks using **Jest** and **Cypress**, achieving **90%** test coverage across application functionalities, thereby enhancing code quality and stability.
• Led the adoption of **Infrastructure as Code (IaC)** practices using tools like **Terraform**, streamlining environment provisioning and management.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and develop **GraphQL** APIs, reducing data retrieval times by **40%** and improving the efficiency of data queries.
• Orchestrated deployment workflows for mobile applications with technologies such as **Fastlane**, resulting in efficient rollouts and management of updates.
• Spearheaded data-driven feature development utilizing analytics for user behavior and performance monitoring, resulting in a **25%** increase in user engagement.
• Enhanced troubleshooting capabilities by establishing rigorous monitoring and alerting systems in line with DevOps best practices, leveraging tools like **Backstop** for visual testing.

• Leveraged **AWS** to build and deploy microservices architecture, enhancing system scalability and reliability for financial applications.
• Employed **TypeScript** to develop interactive front-end applications utilizing **React (18)** and **Next.js**, ensuring responsive design with Redux Toolkit and **Tailwind CSS** for user-friendly interfaces.
• Implemented **CI/CD** pipelines to streamline code deployment and improve release cycles, increasing overall efficiency by **30%**.
• Developed and maintained **RESTful API** services to support seamless integration with internal systems, ensuring high performance amid high transaction loads.
• Utilized **Agile** methodologies to manage project timelines, resulting in successful delivery of projects with an on-time completion rate of **95%**.
• Enhanced testing frameworks using **Jest**, **Cypress**, and **Backstop**, achieving a test coverage of **90%** for front-end applications.
• Constructed event-driven architectures with **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ** to facilitate efficient message processing and low-latency communication across operational workflows.
• Created robust ETL pipelines for processing financial data with **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Data Factory**, optimizing data workflows for batch and streaming use cases.
• Developed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn** and **XGBoost**, significantly improving detection capabilities and reducing false positives by **20%**.
• Integrated real-time analytics capabilities into applications by combining **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, offering critical business insights to stakeholders instantly.

• Leveraged **AWS** for cloud services, ensuring scalable architecture and high availability for the global e-commerce platform.
• Developed and maintained frontend applications using **React** (version 18), enhancing user experience with **TypeScript**, **Redux Toolkit**, and **Tailwind CSS**.
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines facilitating efficient development processes, improving deployment frequency by **30%**.
• Designed microservices architecture with **Node.js** (NestJS, Express) and managed **RESTful APIs** for key modules like checkout and order fulfillment.
• Applied Agile methodologies, leading sprints that resulted in a **25%** reduction in time-to-market for new features.
• Developed and executed automated tests using **Jest**, **Cypress**, and **Backstop** to ensure high software quality and reliability.
• Created robust backend services using **Python** frameworks (FastAPI, Django) and integrated real-time features using **WebSockets** and **Kafka**.
• Collaborated in a microservices environment, optimizing performance and scalability, resulting in a **40%** increase in application responsiveness.
• Engineered data storage solutions with **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Redis**, enabling fault-tolerant operations and fast data retrieval.
• Designed secure payment workflows integrated with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, ensuring compliance with **PCI** standards for sensitive data handling.
• Implemented role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** for user authentication, ensuring GDPR compliance and robust data protection across the platform.
• Participated in feature flagging and blue-green deployment strategies using **Kubernetes**, allowing safe, controlled rollouts of updates.
